item.title: Erp Golang
item.description: Any ERP system written in Go 非开源 https://www.obs2go.com/ open source https://golanglibs.com/search?q=erp&sort=top 中英文 https://getqor.com/cn https://github.com/qor/qor https://github.com/reechou/erp 中文版 https://github.com/hexiaoyun128/ERP.git https://www.ctolib.com/hexiaoyun128-ERP.html hexya 无中文 http://hexya.io/ 中文版 https://github.com/JoyiSystem/goerp golang-erp https://github.com/odenktools/golang-erp
